attributes.action: Change the term Afro Caribbean to just Caribbean as Caribbean's are a mix of people not  African
attributes.additional_details: The Term 'Afro' or African in the ethic classification Afro Caribbean is incorrect it's not used in the Caribbean & is forcing Afrocentric & pan African beliefs on the Caribbean community, if or community is described as just Caribbean this beliefs won't be imposed on people without their permission, as most people from the Caribbean community don't consider themselves African.
